duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform field service activities related to press inspection, repair work, troubleshooting, and maintenance.
Review customer technical concerns to assist in the determination of product changes or modification.
Perform press inspections on a variety of sizes and models.
Provide maintenance and repair training to customer personnel.

education_certification.credential: Associates degree in Skilled Trades or equivalent preferred.
Minimum of two years' experience in a manufacturing environment, in a Field Service capacity, is required.
